homebuyR 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Compute Housing Budget from Disposable Income

    housing_budget_from_dpi.Rd

    Calculates the maximum monthly housing budget based on net income and debt constraints.

    housing_budget_from_dpi(
  net_income,
  max_housing_pct = 0.3,
  max_total_debt_pct = 0.45,
  other_debts = 0
)

    Arguments

    net_income

    Numeric. Net disposable income per month. Must be non-negative.

    max_housing_pct

    Numeric. Maximum fraction of net income for housing costs (e.g., 0.30). Defaults to 0.30.

    max_total_debt_pct

    Numeric. Maximum fraction of net income for total debt obligations (e.g., 0.45). Defaults to 0.45.

    other_debts

    Numeric. Monthly debt payments excluding housing. Must be non-negative. Defaults to 0.

    Value

    Numeric. Recommended maximum monthly housing budget.

    Examples

    # Net income $3000, 30% housing, 40% total debt, other debts $200 -> 900
housing_budget_from_dpi(net_income = 3000, max_housing_pct = 0.30, max_total_debt_pct = 0.40, other_debts = 200)
#> [1] 900
